ygData.subject: Re: Where is the jewelry in Freeport, or is th ere one?
ygData.msgSnippet: the gems are sold at the Arcane Academy, for the most part.....go inside...it s the first NPC woman you come to.... From:	 DeGirolami, Franck
ygData.messageBody:
the gems are sold at the Arcane Academy, for the most part.....go
inside...it's the first NPC woman you come to....




From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...> on 04/28/99 11:42
AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Where is the jewelry in Freeport,
or is th ere one?

From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

no that's the place that sells the silver bars and such...but no
jewels
there
Skara.

-----Original Message-----
From: Bret Guillet [mailto:destine@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 11:36 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Where is the jewelry in Freeport, or is
there one?


From: Bret Guillet <destine@...>

> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> I know the place that sells silver,gold, etc bars. I know all the
merchants
> in the spellcaster's guild that sell some jewels.
> Isnt there are real jewelry in Freeport? In Erudin, you can find
all sorts
> of stones at the jewelry, not only the spell components. But the
trip is
> kinda long to get a few jewels...
> Thanks,
> Skara the Enchantress

I believe there is a blue house in North Freeport that sells all
kinds of
mundane jewelry. Its unmarked and right next to, maybe even
attached to, a
simple two story house that is empty. Its not too far from the Free
Market.
I hope that helps...

--
Destine "Education makes a people easy to lead, but
difficult
Bret Guillet to drive; easy to govern but impossible to
enslave."
destine@... - Lord Brougham
Programmer
